name: 陳怡倩
objective: This course aims at introducing fundamental quantitative research method. Learners will be provided with an introductory foundation in statistical inference that enables them to become competent researchers of basic statistical studies. The course will center at a general introduction to the quantitative research method, descriptive statistics, essential elements of probability, foundations of statistical inference, and an overview of selected hypothesis tests.
